content.detailedDescription: A round orange globe, next to moon as my picture shows. i could see the moon reflect off it an see in the shadow it was round. i took a picture of my neighbors night light to see if i got the same reflection which i did not. i was using ir lighting on the camera. i have never owned a cam recorder before but from the ones i used i never seen this object by the moon before. i don't know if its the camera doing something to cause this. but better safe then sorry to send it to you all. but if sure confused me, my wife and my grandson. thanks for your evaluation of this anomaly.
content.summary: I was using my ir cam recorder. taking a picture of moon when this other object showed up. you could see it with your eye.

content.detailedDescription: My mother and myself where outside on the deck just looking at and enjoying the night sky. we were out there for under a minute when this object came from the west. i grabbed my mother by the shoulders and turned her around to witness what i was seeing coming toward our direction. she grabbed her binoculars which where just inside the door. i ran in the house and grabbed my camera with my 100-400m lens. my mother screamed when she saw what she saw through the binoculars. when i got outside and got the object in my viewfinder i had braced myself against the railing to get the shots i got. the images were taken at about 1.5 timed exposure. we watch the object shine lights into the surrounding clouds that were moving in. they very bright beams of light and moved very quickly. we watch the object after it stopped shooting all over the sky as it hovered for about 8 minutes. then it quickly disappeared into the clouds. we waited for a while to see if we could view the object again but were unsuccessful and went inside to look at the pictures on the computer. needless to say, we were shocked.
content.summary: Ufo came from the west at a high rate of speed then when it got over us it shot to the north then south and then came back to center point

content.detailedDescription:
This is my fourth sighting of various shaped ufos all in the same general area over quebec, canada near gatineau/aylmer.  it was 7:50pm on july 26, 2015, not dark yet and there was a fair amount of cloud cover stretching across the sky but more blue than cloud and the clouds were more white with only some darker areas.

i was facing an open sky over quebec along the ottawa river and just got mesmerized by the cloud formations and all of a sudden my eyes were drawn to an odd shaped cloud - for the ones around it - it was pretty close to a perfect circle, very strange.  the circle was about the size of a cdn nickel in total and the round cloud was quite white and a little opaque.  i could have just looked away but something seemed to be in the centre of that circular cloud so i got out the binoculars.

i was so stunned when i got the binoculars in focus to see what looked like 7 or 8 small bright white objects(size of a third of a pea and round) and 5 of them were in the shape of a chevron and those were stationary and then there were 3 around the chevron and those were moving around, a little quick.  i figured that the 5 lights/objects were attached to one larger thing as they didn't move at all but there was no definite outline of a bigger object.  i watched this odd formation for several minutes and then it all disappeared slowly so i am not sure if it faded on it's own or a cloud came across it all and hid it again.  never saw it again after that.

i was really surprised to see this formation and wondered about stars but it was in no way stars as they were too close and in a definite pattern of a chevron and the other dots of light, like the ones making up the chevron, behaved differently in that they were moving around instead of staying still like the other 5 of the same size.

i had the feeling, can't explain why, that this formation was hiding in the clouds and honestly if you were just looking up at the sky you wouldn't even notice this formation in that round circle of cloud.  the only reason i found it was because i do have a good view of the sky, up higher, and clouds are something i like to look like and i do that fairly often.  my eyes are often pulled to certain cloud formations that seem to stand out for whatever reason, odd shapes and things and this is the second time that something strange came out of one of those sightings of an odd shaped cloud.  the first time it was discounted by mufon but i still think it was a ufo and not a plane because of it's size and the way it moved.  i guess we will have to agree to disagree on that one. 

i am really starting to wonder if people looked at certain clouds for just that little longer they would see ufos hiding as well.  i saw a video on youtube once where someone had filmed what they called 'the formation of a cloud by a ufo' i am guessing they are suggesting something similar, that they are hiding behind clouds.  i am not saying this grouping of ufos i just saw awhile ago was a cloud formed by the ufos but they were definitely right in the middle of the round cloud and i did feel they were trying to stay unseen.  very strange experience.  i drew what i saw, i'm a terrible artist so hope you get the drift.
content.summary: Odd for cloud formation drew my attention only to find a boomerang shaped formation of 5 bright white tiny lights and under that 2 or 3 other bright tiny lights moving around under the boomerang

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my living room with my dogs. they started to growl and
ran into the hallway.  i got up to see what the issue was. i was standing
in the hallway when they started to bark. a white pulsating probe appeared
at eye level 2 feet in front of me. the probe had a glowing aura about it
and each time it pulsed the color changed to that of a rainbow and then
back to white again. it was about the size of a marble. it hovered for
5 seconds in front of me, then it went down the hallway and into my bedroom. i followed it into my bedroom, but it had disappeared. what
makes this unusual is that fact that it was pulsating. not a common thing
when i see them.
content.summary: Pulsating probe appeared at eye level 2 feet infront of me

content.detailedDescription: Was outside around dusk, very faint skyline above eastern divide. saw what i thought was a white light come over the mountain at about 1000ft in elevation above me. at first i thought it was a military helicopter until the bright white light turned into a very large orange orb then dissipated into a red dot. there is literally 5 miles of wilderness from my view on rt311 to rt 43. i thought it might have been something launched from vtech drone field and caught fire and exploded. watched news, nothing reported, nothing reported on mufon either. i did hear a bit of a rumble after it went from white to orange to red and disappeared. spent much time in the military and have seen many things in the air but nothing like this event.
content.summary: Thought i saw an aircraft with landing lights coming over mountain. turned into a large orange orb or fireball then dissipated as it turned red

content.detailedDescription: Took a series of photographs of cloud formations, when processing on my laptop noticed this one that contained a small darkish streak on it, nothing was seen at the time of shooting, was not evident on any of the other pictures and was not due to a mark on the camera lens or computer screen.
content.summary: Object seen when processing photo

content.detailedDescription: I am a security officer with years of exprerience and what i saw on that night was not of this world there was a mist around us and my team was missing for fifteen minutes while we observerd the ojects plus all of my staff are highly trained and reported nothing.  however years following this situation i have had nightmares of aliens in my room and be abducted i am not a glory based but this has happened to me.  i have also worked for transport canada where i have dealt with the unexplained before.  where even the hercules had to land and retrieve and remove material under my watch they could not leave my airport without my knowledge.  there was one time in october 1988 i believe that a green light flew over our airspace and within two hours military were on base and it was reported code blue they brought something back with them but the soldiers were never seen on the tarmac put straight on the plane and left.  i have may more files to share if you would like that are true.
content.summary: Multiple lights three orbiting one central

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving leaving our development heading south 
saw 3 bright orange lights just under the crescent moon i observe them move in sharp right angles and in circular movements as i drove and observe the 3rd light disappeared.  the other lights disappeared from sight and 3to 5'minutes later observed 2 lights re appear i took 3 pictures as one of the lights began to dim. they then moved northeast at high speed and lost sight of the objects
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observe just under crescent moon 3 orange/red lights lights moved  in right angles and the made a circle  3 light disappeared then second light faded and re energized

content.detailedDescription: We were posing for pictures on pickens nose rock as some girls were making our picture from across the way on pickens nose cliffs. noticed object when we were looking at pictures. kevin thought it was a hawk but then realized it was a round object in the air. since all our information is from the photo,there was no actions or motions noted. we were surprised to see something in the photo that we didn't notice while picture was being made. we were very curious as to what it could be. also it bears saying that we did not see the object in the photo until we were looking at pictures in the car. we had left the area and driven away.However, while we were hiking, i remember feeling strange. i thought maybe i was dehydrated/over exerted, although i had been drinking water. i didn't feel very alert and told kevin, i felt like a zombie. walking down the path felt very dreamlike and surreal. kevin made the comment that when he took his glasses off, he felt dizzy.
content.summary: Three photos were made in rapid succession. second photo showed object. first and third photos showed no object.

content.detailedDescription: I am a security officer with years of exprerience and what i saw on that night was not of this world there was a mist around us and my team was missing for fifteen minutes while we observerd the ojects plus all of my staff are highly trained and reported nothing.  however years following this situation i have had nightmares of aliens in my room and be abducted i am not a glory based but this has happened to me.  i have also worked for transport canada where i have dealt with the unexplained before.  where even the hercules had to land and retrieve and remove material under my watch they could not leave my airport without my knowledge.  there was one time in october 1988 i believe that a green light flew over our airspace and within two hours military were on base and it was reported code blue they brought something back with them but the soldiers were never seen on the tarmac put straight on the plane and left.  i have may more files to share if you would like that are true.
content.summary: Multiple lights three orbiting one central

content.detailedDescription: I was out side when i saw a green, red, and white orb shaped object in the sky, above the tree line, near the blue ridge parkway, daytime, it moved from e to w.
content.summary: It was an orb

content.detailedDescription: Around noon on sunday july 26, 2015, i was reclining in a chaise lounge chair facing south in my front yard. i looked up, almost directly overhead, to see a very small reflective object traveling at a high rate of speed from the south, in a direct line north. i got up quickly to get a better view, and lost sight to the north from my vantage point. all this occurred in less than 10 seconds. there were no clouds and no breeze, no other known aircraft or birds in the area. i certainly don't believe that it was a satellite. i do believe that i witnessed an unidentified flying object.
content.summary: Saw an extremely fast object in daylight overhead for less than 10 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving leaving our development heading south 
saw 3 bright orange lights just under the crescent moon i observe them move in sharp right angles and in circular movements as i drove and observe the 3rd light disappeared.  the other lights disappeared from sight and 3to 5'minutes later observed 2 lights re appear i took 3 pictures as one of the lights began to dim. they then moved northeast at high speed and lost sight of the objects
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observe just under crescent moon 3 orange/red lights lights moved  in right angles and the made a circle  3 light disappeared then second light faded and re energized

content.detailedDescription:
Orange orbs and phosphorus

on the evening of august 31, 2014 i had my first observation and video capture of an orange orb.  to call it orange is somewhat of a misnomer.  the attached image will bear that out as it appears orange.   however from my first observation of it, the light given off was really quite brilliant and more yellowish.  the rays which emanated from it also had a peculiar quality that normally i do not see with light.  there was definition to the rays, and they came to a point.  the camera phone which took the image just does no justice to the reality.

i first became aware of more research into the orange orb phenomenon in the may 2015 issue of mufon’s ufo journal.  the article authored by robert spearing went into good detail of 110 sightings in new jersey between january 2009 and january 2015.  one of the commonalities is that they appear in areas which are rich in phosphorus such as certain coastal waters, and other waterways which have runoff from fertilizer.  other coincidences of high orb sightings occurs during the 4th of july celebrations, and new year’s eve due to the phosphorus in fireworks.

another mufon member besides myself who lives in the northeast independence, mo area has also seen many orange orbs.  i decided to investigate known phosphorus levels in the missouri river near to where she lives, and blue springs lake where i saw mine.  the attached charts show the content.

the two sampling sites bs-4 and bs-11 show that between july 14 and september 25, 2014, the levels of phosphorus increased to nearly double the average recommended ecoregion criteria.  this is mostly from runoff from neighborhoods and annual fertilization of yards.  

when compared with the previous year, the period from august 15 and september 11, 2013 the site bs-3 also showed a spike above the recommended level.  however, clearly there was much more available in august and september 2014, the time period in which i observed the orb.   

the year 2012 saw a ufo flap in missouri in the blue springs-independence-lee’s summit area.  an interesting observation is that a huge spike of phosphorus occurred in blue springs lake.  after researching the mufon files, i noticed 27 filed reports of different types of craft.  most of my search parameters included “spheres”, “circles”, “fireball”, and “other”.  they did not all however resemble orange orbs.  some did, others were clearly larger craft.  yet there was a lot of activity for that two month period.  the following shows the 900% increase from the normal levels of phosphorus which occurred in august 2012.

overall in the state of missouri, smithville lake, truman lake, and long branch lake are about the same in phosphorus content on an average basis as blue springs lake.  in kansas though, millford lake, and tuttle creek lake are about 7 times higher in phosphorus than the recommended ecoregion criteria.


the missouri river basin
the flow of the missouri river from its headwaters in montana, through its flowing into the mississippi river north of st. louis, is shown in the attached map.

the entire missouri river from its source down through the state of missouri gathers phosphorus from surrounding farmlands through fertilizer catchments.  it happens that the area of sightings in northeast independence by the river corresponds to the area of highest density of phosphorus from incremental catchments, in the “bullseye” of the region.  that area has over 200 kilograms per square kilometer per year. this is the equivalent of over 440 pounds of phosphorus per .4 square miles.

summary
1.	it is now obvious that at least two areas of known phosphorus activity in bodies of water in the independence, blue springs, lee’s summit area are also areas of orange orb activity.
2.	both areas are not restricted however to sightings of orange orbs.  many other types of craft happen to frequent the entire area.
3.	spearing’s article focused only on orange orb activity in those areas of phosphorus.  it is quite possible that other craft also find the areas to be of interest as well, whether for the phosphorus content, or for other reasons as yet to be discovered.
4.	the lake of the ozarks area has seen reports of 31 sightings on the mufon site.  its phosphorus levels generally over the area are about twice the recommended ecoregion criteria levels, although not enough information was available to compare the sightings with the timing of the phosphorus measurements.  
5.	the area of the james river basin south of springfield has many high phosphorus levels.  there have been over 50 sightings in the springfield area, although not enough information was available to compare the sightings with the timing of the phosphorus measurements.
content.summary: Orange orbs and phosphorus

content.detailedDescription: Morning walk with dogs. suddenly a transparent object appears. the air starts flickering like on a hot day in a desert. it was around 20degress celsius at this time. at the moment the object appeared, a very hot wind started to blow. after a few seconds a little white-grey ball appeared out of the object, moving towards me and my dogs. around me the air was extremely warm. i felt something like an eletric field and i had the feeling of an non-verbal, unknown communication, a beautiful, peaceful heat in my body. i tried to take a picture with my mobile phone. in that moment something like a flash hit me and i thought i'm falling down. when i was on the ground i picked up my phone: the time indicated on the display was +30 minutes! the air wasn't hot anymore and the object was away.  the two dogs woke up 50min minutes later
content.summary: A flickering transparent cloud like very hot air, white ball appeared surrounded by very warm air

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend was out fishing with a friend and took this photo, along with others all within the same minute. only this photo had the image in the sky.
content.summary: Odd object in picture (in sky)

content.detailedDescription:
At first i would like to tell you that i translated my written text into english. the questions above were tricky. i write you, because i saw on n24 a documentation about ufos and about your organisation.

it happened on a saturday evening between 20 and 21 o'clock. i drove from delmenhorst to wildeshausen (lower saxony, germany) on the way to a disco. it is not possible to give an exactly date, because i did not write it down. but: i worked from monday to friday and on friday evening i always went to sports. so it is most seemly a saturday. it only could be the year 1998 or 1999. the month could be august or septembre.

i remember the weather of that evening: it was light, temperature was comfortable, perhaps 20°c. the streets were dry and the trees full of green leaves. in the sky the cloud cover was closed and i saw a flying object crossing my street and flying in the hight of the under edge of the cloud cover.

i had never seen something like that and i immediately stopped my car, stopped the machine and jumped out to see and listen. but i heard nothing but the highway no. 1 (2 km away). shape: it was a triangle. in the edges there were very intense white lights and in the middle i saw a small red light - i think it was blinking but am not sure. i could not see a light beam.

the velocity was constant. the path was straight. i have problems to guess the hight and speed and its size. but: we know s. th. about the weather. that might help.

a few months ago on n24 i saw a documentation about ufo sightings in europe in the 80's. it was in belgium, where exactely those objects were seen, what i saw. so i didn't feel alone with this and wrote my sighting down.
content.summary: Flying triangle with no sound but white lights in the edges

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a 63 year old white guy, high school, some college. in 1972-73 i worked at an open pit chalk mine near huber, ga. i was an oiler(helper) on a dragline. part of my job was to operate the machine. had a 2 man crew, 3 shifts, 24 hrs a day, 7 days a week. we were in a clearing surrounded by miles of forests. on the 11pm-7am shift, each person would would run the machine 4 hours and sleep 4 hours. one night about 2/3am i was operating the machine and saw a large light appear at the edge of my vision to the right, just over the tree tops. it moved slowly into view. when i saw the shape i was shaken. it was a "flying saucer", with an orange body and red dome. i watched it for 2-3 minutes, stopped the machine and ran to wake up the operator. (he was pretty sharp, kind of a redneck, had been around, so he knew about lots of things). we got to the operators booth(about 30 ft off the ground). the ufo was was about in the center of our vision. we watched it slowly move across the treetops untill it was out of sight to the left. we guessed it was about 80 ft. long with a 20 ft. in diameter dome. the operator looked at me and said "don't you say anything about this to anybody". so 2 people saw this for about 10 minutes and agreed it was a ufo. i never said anything untill years later when ufos would come up in conversation. 

after watching some of your shows on discovery, another aspect came to me. i had almost forgotten about it. missing time.
 
the mine ran 24-7 365. we had a recording unit that kept a graph on a scroll.
another worker showed me how to turn the machine off and said if i wanted to take a little nap while the other guy slept, just turn it off. i did this one night and told the operator about it the next night. he came un-glued. he stopped the clock, pulled the scroll out and showed me how the managers could plainly see the "short shift". i promised him i would never do it again. about a month later i took a break from work and went up to the operator booth. the operator was very mad. he said "you stopped the clock again". he pulled the scroll out and there was 45 minutes missing on our last shift. i don't remember stopping that clock. i didn't put this together till i saw your show. 

i came home from the navy about 1982-83 era, went to the mine to see some old buddies and asked about my operator. they said right after i left the mine he found out he had cancer and was dead in a few months.

after moving around all those years, i now live about 5 miles from where we saw the ufo. never saw another one or been abducted, that i know of. 

so: ufo, missing time and your buddy died of cancer a few years after seeing the ufo.

there is so much we don't know about.

g. t. gray jr.
26jul15
content.summary: 2am-at work- forrested area with clearing-with witness-saw ufo treetop level appear right horizon to left horizon-saucer shaped-glowing orange with red dome

content.detailedDescription:
Shelburne, nova scotia. 
9:45pm monday, june 14, 2014. 
chatting with, more listening to, co-workers. 
looking up at the clear darkening sky above and at the sun setting and the appearing stars, every now and then. on one look-up, i saw three circular discs in a triangular formation; each one emanating white light.  duration maybe 5 seconds from sighting to disappearance. directly above me, not at an angle. no sound from it/them; no apparent structural connection. lights were still and faded out of sight. no movement, just faded then gone. no eye glass glare, clear view to sky. mentioned to one person later, but not reported until now.
content.summary: On one look-up, i saw three circular discs  in a triangular formation;  each one emanating white light.   duration maybe 5 seconds

content.detailedDescription: On july 4th 2105 i was riding in a car traveling west on otterman street in greensburg pennsylvania at approximately 9:15 pm. i came up the hill where the helicopter launch pad is and looked up into the southern sky and noticed a bright orange light floating toward the southern sky over westmoreland hospital. it floated very gently until it disappeared into the south western sky.
content.summary: Coming through downtown greensburg and saw an orange light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: After leaving the fireworks on july 4th,2013 at approximately 10:30pm, my uncle and i started to pack up our setup and started walking towards the direction of our car. as we turn to leave, w notice something a bright orange light floating in the sky. i pointed it out to my uncle, who said it was an ash from a firework. as we kept observing it, it turned out to be a gently controlled floating object. once we got into the car, my uncle noticed another floating orange light going in the same direction as the first. we observed it for about three minutes, because it was moving slightly faster than the first one we observed. according to the information that my uncle collected form the last convention, we discovered that we witnessed a sighting of an orange orb.
content.summary: Two gently moving lights across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was baby sitting my grandson at my son-inlaw's trailer in mt pleasant pa (about 5 minutes from kecksburgh crash site). it was around 11 pm . i was outside smoking and looking up at the stars as usual. i had my cell phone and was taking pictures of scenery when i noticed something blinking in the sky. i it kept getting brighter. it seemed like it was changing color but was hard to tell because of its place in the sky. i took out my cell phone and kept photographing it. went back inside to check the baby.I sat for a bit and was examining the photos. to ky suprise it was a disc shape object changing and morphing into small red, green, blue, white and silver orbs. which i have both video and photographic evidence. so after about an hour or two i went back outside to look and see if it was still there. i looked at the postion that it was in and it was gone.I then used the phone camera to see if i could see it somewhere else the sky. looking through the camera i panned the sky and turning to my right the trailer was in view.  omg i saw a craft hovering over the trailer about 20 feet above and a golden beam coming out from underneath it. ithen looked with the naked eye and it was gone. i looked through the phone again and it was still there. after several times of doing this i had come to the conclusion that i couldnt see it with the naked eye but through the camera alone. the beam coming out of it had multiple silver orbs either being emitted or retrieving them. the craft was dull silver but i could see that with the naked eye but not the beam. the timing was really weird.I dnt know how long i was examing what i was seeing but found out later that it had been about 2 more hours had gone past. it was hovering all thattime and just disappeared like nothing ....Like in a blink of an eye. i can describe it better in person. after this experience i posted it online to a friend....The pics and videos of both the orb changing colrs and the craft and beam. and after i did.... my life has beeen altered. i cant have an email...Every phone that i purchase will not work properly as if my calls and msgs are being diverted to another number, i havent had an email or phone since then. only a land line and it is affected as well.But need that for emergency. if someone gets in touch with me i have photos and video of both incidents. thanks for your time.... love and light



kim muic   07/25 2015 
to get in contact with me...The best is by mail....Postal service. thanks
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Life changing crafter beams.

content.detailedDescription:
I was 12 years old and living in orange, ca during the late summer of 1956.  at approximately 9:00 pm i exited the rear east side of our home, into the completely dark back yard.  i was going next door, where my parents were visiting neighbors.  i took about two steps into the backyard when i realized there was a yellow self-luminous saucer shaped craft at my 11 o'clock at a height of 50-70 feet.  i immediately realized it was a ufo.  it was stationary, smooth, featureless, no seams, rivits, windows or markings.  it looked very much like the old moon hubcaps.  within 3-5 seconds it silently glided away southbound, rising at about 15 degrees. after 10 seconds it turned eastboard and ascended at another 20-30 degrees.  it remained flat, never banking to turn.  i would estimate its size at 4o feet.  it did not spin and was completely silent.  there was no down drafts, heat or visible means of propulsion.

the first thing i did upon seeing the ufo was to look for windows.  there were none.  the color, yellow, was a very middle of the road color.  what was interesting was that the entire craft was that color.  the color had depth to it, somewhat like looking at jello.  there definitely was not a glow or aura on the outside.  i could only see the bottom of the ufo at all times.  i got to observe it for at least 15 seconds as it slowly faded into the very starry night.  i remember thinking i could have easily hit it with my bow and arrow.

growing up, i observed three atomic bomb tests.  i lived near area 51, without knowing it at the time.  i saw rockets and all kinds of aircrafts as my father's job took him to airforce bases working for the corps of engineers.  i was a police officer for 24 years and never observed a ufo again.
content.summary: Observed a yellow saucer convex shaped craft at night from approximately 50 feet away

content.detailedDescription: Something with strange changing flashing lights came over the field and house from my left as it got closer it dropped and moved in erratic motions lowering and moving left and right up and down in no way a plane or helicopter could move.  there were several different colored lights.  it then started to hover and lower and hang in one spot.  my brother and i felt like it was observing us so we ran back in the house and saw it shoot back up in the sky as we ran.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Something with strange changing flashing lights came over the field and house from my left as it got closer it dropped and moved in erratic motions lowering and moving left and right up and down in no way a plane or helicopter could move.

content.detailedDescription:
At 1:30 am on saturday june 25 i drove to claymont, de from wilmington with my boyfriend. parked at my parents' house and left him in the car while i ran inside. my sisters fiancé was leaving at the time, heading west. after about 8 minutes, i left the house, walking west towards the car. once beside the vehicle, i stopped to put my hair up and as i glanced upwards, i saw a bar of intense yellow-white light, perpendicular to my position, suspended in the sky. there were few clouds, although there was a slight haze or fog, but my view was largely unobstructed. after silently hovering for 4 or 5 seconds, the light intensified and then vanished, leaving me with sunspots. at first, it looked as though the entire underside of a commercial airliner's fuselage had been covered with lights, but i couldn't make out wings or any discernable shape other than the bar of light. when it vanished, it reminded me of the millennium falcon, but yellow-white instead of blue-white, without any distinguishable body. 

of note: my boyfriend is in the car the entire time, looking at my face as i'm gawking, trying to piece together what i'm seeing. after it vanishes, i hop in the car, try to quickly explain what i just saw, open the sunroof and then 'pop' the engine starts smoking. my car suddenly overheated (on a cool night, with no cooling system problems). i run inside and get my dad (a mechanic) and we are temporarily sidetracked from the ufo.

flash forward 30 minutes: we've gotten a ride home and i have a chance to talk to my boyfriend. he says that 2 minutes before i came out of the house, he got an unsettled feeling and checked all of the mirrors and rolled down the windows to look around. he never looked up, but then i came out of the house and saw what we both believe gave him that feeling. 

forward even more: the engine problem was traced to a coupler directly attached to the thermostat, a piece that according to my dad should not have broken where it did. might be coincidence...
content.summary: Bright bar of lush white/yellow light hovered overhead, intensified, then ascended quickly. millennium falcon like.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: At 11 at night my girlfriend and i were sitting outside of a park star gazing. as we looked at the stars for a long period of time i pointed out to her that two of them did not look like stars. there distance was that of a star though. after staring at them for some time light started to flash around them. we originally thought that they were satellites. we saw what looked like shooting stars throughout the night and thought we were lucky to be where we were. eventually i began to here noises in the woods and asked her what animal life was around because i no longer felt alone. a short time after a sound occurred around us like when mr. smith entered neo in the first matrix movie but more brief. we both heard this noise and felt extremely unsettled all of a sudden as if we needed to leave, something or someone was near. we packed up our things and i was asked which direction we should go and as if something forced my decision i definitively stated "up this hill to the opening." as we walked we sighted the first orb of light. at first my girlfriend believed it was a bug but it's size increased and a sound was made by it like a plane but more silent and smooth. it flew just above us into the distance and we followed it with our eyes until my girlfriend temporarily broke down. she fell to her knees and her eyes began to water with disbelief. i had a sense of calmness and got her gathered and we traveled to an opening in the middle of a field. after standing there shortly another orb flew past us making another sound. as we stared into the sky we could see multiple light orbs flying in the sky at a much further distance. at first we believed they were military until we noticed the speed at which they traveled. my girlfriend felt that she saw something some distance away but i felt like we needed to stay were we were. after some time we both decided to stay and laid out blankets to lay on. looking in the sky we continued to notice the light orbs at varying distances. the sky looked like a fluid membrane and above us clouds surrounded us in all directions except for directly above our area. objects, maybe ships seemed to be above us but cloaked from our vision. what looked like stars were moving slightly together in unison leading us to believe that something was there. we heard noises around us but could not tell what they were and for periods of time buzzing sounds occurred. i felt as if i were going to be taken and i was alone in that belief. after much discussion and an inability to leave for some reason i began to experience the inexplicable. i told my girlfriend not to let me close my eyes for no apparent reason. afterwards i did close my eyes and could feel her looking at me as soon as she did. i asked her why she was looking at e and she said that she just did at that moment. this happened three more times before my first episode. i looked at her and said "i feel like my body is dying." she had no response. my muscles felt like they were atrophying and eventually i felt like i was nothing. my eyes rolled back in my head as i felt pressure building in my mind. as something was attempting to pull my being from my body i fought it for what felt like hours. it had been 10 seconds and i awoke screaming and crying and kept saying that i was scared. my muscles had tensed to a point that i had never experienced and once again i experienced the same thing. i awoke again having no idea how long i had been out with my girlfriend on top of me holding me down crying. she was screaming stay with me! look at me! i couldn't focus on her and my eyes wandered around the sky. i felt as if i was looking at something but nothing was there. my vision was altered and i was no longer perceiving the earth for the reality i normally did. my girlfriend appeared foreign. i had seen her as if she was not human, through the eyes of something else. i had continued to break down and scream and cry frightfully until finally she stood me up and we began to pack. i could not walk normally, my steps were small and my eyes wandered and i turned my head looking all around me in confusion. with the help of my girlfriend we made it to the path that led back to my car and we saw one last orb. it flashed with green and red and eventually only white. it was the only one with these colors. the experience was over but my mind continued to break down for some time until we returned home and i was able to sleep. the following night my girlfriend laid awake and noticed what looked like a shooting star. followed by more and more until she thought it was a meteor shower. she realized that these were the same orbs we saw the night before and looked online and noticed there were no meteor showers that night in our area.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed over 20 ufos over a night fly above and around myself and my girlfriend

content.detailedDescription: When i woke up, i looked out of my bedroom window and saw this entity standing near my barn. it looked like a 'gumby' figure about 11 feet tall. i could tell that because it was about a foot above the 10 foot fence it was standing by. it was around 3 am. it stood there about 10 minutes or so and when finally i grabbed my cell phone and went outside to see a better view of the entity, it was gone. during my observation of it, i could feel inside my head that it wanted to talk to me.
content.summary: Woke up, looked out my bedroom window and saw this entity standing near my barn.

content.detailedDescription:
Estabamos en una agua termal para nuestra respectiva limpieza corporal hasta que me fije en el cielo y encontrã‰ un objeto brillante ovalado haciendo un recorrido de sur a norte, asombrado indique a mis amigos ver el cielo lo cual ellos hicieron. y tambiã‰n vieron el objeto.

simplemente no era la primera vez que veã�a uno este caso es el segundo en mi vida
content.summary: Avistamiento de objeto ovalado no terrestre

content.detailedDescription: El objeto apareciã³ de un momento a otro, al inicio no le hice caso solo. iba de paseo con mis dos hijos menores de edad en la moto.
content.summary: El objeto apareciã³ de un momento a otro, al inicio no le hice caso solo

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of august 1976 myself and three brothers, older sister and mother observed two ufo's.  it was a beautiful mostly clear summer day not to hot as myself and three other brothers (ages 13,13,12 and 10) were playing a game of ping pong in our garage with the garage door open.    our youngest brother left for a few minutes to go around the back of the house and retrieve the slip and slide and bring it around to the front of the house.  when he arrived in the back yard he noticed a bright metallic colored, cigar shaped object hovering above the tree tops over the park/field (nw) adjacent to our families home and it was emitting what looked liked to be like a silver and reddish metallic like sparks from the bottom of the object.  he immediately, ran around back to the garage where he explained to myself and my other two brothers what we had seen.  we immediately ran around to the back of the house where our younger brother pointed to where he had seen the object and it was no longer there. however to the right of where the cigar shaped object was. was now a bright pulsating round object hovering steadily above the treetops.  at this time my brother ran into the house and got my older sister and mother to come outside and look at this object with us.  when they arrived was it hovering in place making no noise and it emitted a reddish, yellow and orange glow.  it stayed stationary for a few minutes and then began to move slowly to the right approximately 500' before hovering again for another few minutes.  at this time my sister ran into the house to see if we had a camera to get a photo or binoculars to get an even better close up look at the object.  she returned a few minutes later with neither.  at this time it was still hovering  approximately 100 to 200' feet above the tree tops.  the object then began to move slowly away from us towards the mountains to the nw and did not change shape or color for the next 4 to 5 minutes.  it then seemed to change course to due north and then upward and sped off at great speed and disappeared from sight.  we were all stunned by this observation.  at the time this sighting occurred this area was very rural with very few neighbors as we wanted to call other and see if they had seen the objects.  my mother called what neighbors were around to enquire if they had seen anything without results.  my mother then called the nearest major city st. louis (90 miles north) tv station kmov channel 4 to see if they had received any reports of this sighting and the did not.  we had ample amount of time to see and study this object.  it was not an aircraft, ballon, cloud formation, smoke or a planet.  we were all amazing calm during this sighting and wanted to understand what this object was.  to this day we still discuss this sighting and its unusual charaecterists.
content.summary: Observation of two unusual objects at our home one summer afternoon
